doc.title: Christmas in San Antonio
doc.plot: A Christmas special hosted by Perry Como featuring the culture, history and people of San Antonio, Texas. The special highlighted historic sites such as the Alamo, Mission San Jose, the Riverwalk and San Fernando Cathedral. Special guests included Angie Dickinson, George Strait, then Mayor Henry G. Cisneros, the San Antonio Symphony and the Fifth Army Band & Air Force Band of the West.
